name: La Sportiva Stream Gore-Tex Surround Light Trail Shoes - Men's
categories: Stream Gore-Tex Surround Light Trail Shoes
description: Hike to the top of Thunder Bay's Sleeping Giant in comfortable, breathable light trail shoes. A waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry if you stop to explore the shores of Lake Superior, and a mesh upper and midsole aeration channels keep your toes breezy on hot summer days. Grippy lugs give you mountain goat-like balance on even the slipperiest terrain.Tough mesh upper with Nano Cell 2.0 structure offers durable breathability.Gore-Tex® Surround® membrane keeps water out and lets your feet breathe.Ortholite insole adds cushioning underfoot.Compression-molded EVA midsole with STB Control gives you comfort, stability and snugness.Aeration channels in the midsole help keep your feet dry and cool.Vibram® XS Trek outsole grips whatever the trail throws at you.
